item.title: Specialized Tarmac SL6è£…è½¦
item.description: Header It’s been a while since I tinkered with my bike. I just bought a roval aero handlebar recently and plan to run the cables internally to make it looks better. I disassembled the bike myself to try it out, but dealing with the Shimano 7020 setup with two hydraulic cables and two shift cables (a total of four lines) was quite a challenge. This led me to consider buying
